channel.title: Have People Talk in different colors
channel.description:
Right now i am working on getting everyones typing to turn a color ex: Regular people ~ Yellow Mods ~ Green Admins ~ Blue Owners ~ Red
So instead of typing red: they would automatically be talking in red, any ideas?

item.title: Have People Talk in different colors
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Glitch Legit Glitch
item.description:
@Legit_Glitch wrote:

(command.equalsIgnoreCase("yell")

I searched for that and can’t find my yell command, got a peice of a yell command so i can find mine?

Read full topic
item.source: Have People Talk in different colors

item.description:

ex:
Regular people ~ Yellow
Mods ~ Green
Admins ~ Blue
Owners ~ Red

So instead of typing red: they would automatically be talking in red, any ideas?[/quote]

Post your yell command and I will add it for you.
